message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. It's a great deal for both of us. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,500. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $7,500 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $9,000 to make this deal work. Let's meet in the middle.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to come down to $9,000, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $8,500? That's the maximum I can go
